sentence.content: THE World Bank will link loan volume to the strength of a country&apost;s efforts to fight poverty, according to an operational directive to staff issued today by Mr Lewis Preston, the bank&apost;s president.

sentence.content: The link between loans and poverty relief forms part of a new drive to make poverty alleviation the bank&apost;s central mission in the 1990s.

sentence.content: The shift in priorities is also reflected in a commitment to make comprehensive assessments of the nature and extent of poverty in the third world, allowing the bank to design more effective policies to fight poverty.
